main event: Two civilian men observed a light-coloured flying object crossing the sky at a high rate of speed on July 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object was seen crossing from east to west,The estimated altitude of the object was between 3,000 to 5,000 feet,The object moved at a high speed,There were two confirmed witnesses to the sighting,The observer described the object as possibly metallic and not resembling any known aircraft.
